CustomField.description:
E2B (R2): B.2.i.8, reactionoutcome (1N)
E2B (R3): E.i.7 Outcome of Reaction / Event at the Time of Last Observation Conformance: Required Data Type: 1N OID: 2.16.840.1.113883.3.989.2.1.1.11 Value Allowed: 1 = recovered/resolved 2 = recovering/resolving 3 = not recovered/not resolved/ongoing 4 = recovered/resolved with sequelae 5 = fatal 0 = unknown
CustomField.inlineHelpText: In case of irreversible congenital anomalies, the choice not recovered/not resolved/ongoing should be used. For other irreversible medical conditions, recovered/resolved with sequelae should be used. Fatal should be used when death is possibly related.
CustomField.label: Outcome at Last Observation
